inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: A plan that covers only part of a municipality.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: infra-local

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Plan at municipal level, corresponding to the lower level of administration equivalent to LAU2 as laid down in Annex III to Regulation (EC) No 1059/2003 of the European Parliament and of the Council (OJ L 154, 21.6.2003, p. 1.)
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: local

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: A plan that overlaps several municipalities (entirely or partially).
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: supra-local

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: A plan that overlaps several infra-administrative units in one administrative region.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: infra-regional

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Plan at regional level (equivalent to NUTS2 of EUROSTAT nomenclature of statistical units as established in Regulation (EC) No 1059/2003).
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: regional

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: A plan that overlaps several administrative regions.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: supra-regional
